name: Dance of Epiphron
description:
Epiphron, the Greek God of Prudence and Shrewdness, challenges you to his trial, after which, if you succeed, you will get his blessing. Winning will require strategy and patience, but sometimes you might use some more risky solutions !

Inspired by Daleks: The game by Isaac Sukin, Dance of Epiphron is a game where you will have to move your pawn over a 15x15 checkerboard to escape the opponents pawns. You will be able to use bombs to explode them, and teleport yourself, but with a limited count of safe teleports. Each time you take an action, enemies will move toward you.

Made in 1 week by : Robin Six • Programming, Lighting, Sound Design, 2D Art Elie Paquiet • 3D Art, Environment
